pages.text: A $(l)pickaxe$() is one of the most commonly used $(l:tools/tool)tools$() in the game, being required to mine all ores, rock, rock-based blocks and metal-based blocks. A pickaxe allows the player to mine blocks at faster speeds, depending on the material it is made from. Specific pickaxe materials are also required to harvest certain types of blocks.

pages.title: Getting an Upgrade
pages.text: Construct a better pickaxe.$(br2)Have a stone pickaxe in your inventory.

pages.title: Isn't It Iron Pick
pages.text: Upgrade your pickaxe.$(br2)Have an iron pickaxe in your inventory.
